decision_conditions: The size and design of the proposed dormer windows are considered out of keeping with the character of the building and the adjoining Canalside Conservation area contrary to Policies 7.4, 7A, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and London Plan Policies D4 and HC1 and not compliant with guidance in Ealing Interim Guidance in SPD4: Residential Extensions. | The submitted application drawings showing the proposed amendments are not consistent with the approved elevations, with different sizes and positions of windows and dormer windows .
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow changes to the roof design,  in relation to planning permission reference 202749FUL dated  22/02/2021 for'' Construction of a two storey building with habitable loft space to contain 5 self-contained studio flats and provision of associated cycle storage''
